entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sandy Lake Airport 03:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to periods of freezing drizzle or flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
